items.title: 火 (huǒ)
items.content:
Meaning: fire, flame

Pinyin: huǒ

Stroke count: 4

This character represents fire. The strokes resemble flames rising upward.

items.title: 山 (shān)
items.content:
Meaning: mountain, hill

Pinyin: shān

Stroke count: 3

This character means mountain. The three vertical strokes represent mountain peaks.

items.title: 木 (mù)
items.content:
Meaning: tree, wood, timber

Pinyin: mù

Stroke count: 4

This character represents a tree. The horizontal stroke is the branches, the vertical stroke is the trunk, and the diagonal strokes are the roots.
